Rtf.notes: scaled by 1.5; litter, fast, and intermediate from GTMM

Rts.notes: scaled by 1.5; slow pool from GTMM

Rta.notes: protected soil pool; scaled by 3.5 for consistency with Wang et al. (2019) and new GTMM

netEv_Hg0.notes: net evasion of Hg(0) from surface ocean to atmosphere

vert_ocsi.notes: gross detrainment flux, surface to intermediate (ref: HMA, v9-01-02, 2005 avg)

vert_ocis.notes: vertical seawater flow, intermediate to surface

vert_ocid.notes: vertical seawater flow, intermediate to deep

ps_ocd.notes: particle settling, burial in deep marine sediment

vert_ocdi.notes: vertical seawater flow, deep to intermediate

fveg.notes: fraction of biomass burning and riverine Hg from living biomass

fsoil.notes: fraction of biomass burning and riverine Hg from soil

fCfast.notes: fraction of soil carbon in fast pool (Smith-Downey et al., 2010)

fCslow.notes: fraction of soil carbon in slow pool (Smith-Downey et al., 2010)

fCarmored.notes: fraction of soil carbon in protected pool (Smith-Downey et al., 2010)

tot_resp.notes: total terrestrial Hg emissions tied to respiration of associated SOM

Te_exfs.notes: decomposition associated Hg transfer; fast pool to slow pool

Te_exfa.notes: decomposition associated Hg transfer; fast pool to protected pool

Te_exsf.notes: exchange among soil pools; slow to fast

Te_exsa.notes: exchange among soil pools; slow to protected

Te_exaf.notes: exchange among soil pools, protected to fast

Te_exam.notes: exchange among soil pools, protected to mineral reservoir

fdep_tf.notes: fraction of wet deposition partitioning to fast terrestrial pool

fdep_ts.notes: fraction of wet deposition partitioning to slow terrestrial pool

fdep_ta.notes: fraction of wet deposition partitioning to protected terrestrial pool

f_HgPexport.notes: fraction of riverine Hg export reaching open ocean; from Zhang et al. (2015)
